s: ^Hi, Mrs.Lee! It’s lovely to see you too!

Chat1: ^Mrslee?Smiling "Did you hear that people from mentorship group have joined water fitness? We just had class! I feel so happy for Lila!"
Chat2: ^Mrslee?Smiling "Good! I love water fitness class! My friends meet there every week. And now, maybe, I have new friends in class."
^Mrslee?Smiling "Afterwards, we get lunch together and talk about our families, about our gardens. about getting older."

s: ^I love that! Hey, do you have a minute for a question?

Chat3: ^Mrslee?Smiling "It is. Between class, my friends, and helping Lila, I don't worry for Eddie too much."
^Mrslee?Smiling "How about you? What are you up to?"

s: ^You’re a wonderful grandmother, Mrs.Lee. Hey, can I ask you something?
^I was wondering if you knew how Eddie has made new friends?

Explain1: ^Mrslee?Neutral "I always try my best to answer,

s: ^A close friend is trying to meet some new people. Do you have any advice?
^Hey, I’m trying to help a friend make some new connections. Any thoughts?

Suggestion1: ^Mrslee_Day 3_Connecting with community can include deepening existing relationships_Lila3-3

Suggestion1.#: notification Mrslee_Day 3_Connecting with community can include deepening existing relationships_Lila3-3

Suggestion1: ^Mrslee?Neutral "I have weekly video calls with old friends. We invite new friends sometimes, like I include a few ladies from fitness class. I feel really supported."
^Mrslee?Neutral "Making new friends used to feel hard, but going to class and library help me meet new friends and get to know acquaintances I didn’t know I had much in common with."
^Mrslee?Neutral "Woman from library also lost her husband. We bond and spend time together a lot now. I find friends in many places."
^Mrslee?Smiling "It can be easy to forget the people right nearby. Tell your friend to think about who they talk to this week. and follow up with them."

s: ^Ah, I see. Do you know how Eddie has made new friends?

Suggestion2: ^Mrslee_Day 3_When entering a new space, bring someone you trust with you for support_Lila3-4

Suggestion2.#: notification Mrslee_Day 3_When entering a new space, bring someone you trust with you for support_Lila3-4

Suggestion2: ^Mrslee?Smiling "Eddie always ask friends to go with him to new places. He say "You come with me, I go with you." So, new places always feel safe."
^Mrslee?Smiling "That help me because every new class has one friend, it seems. So every new class is safe."
^Mrslee?Smiling "In a new place, having buddy can be very special. It make him feel okay to go alone after some time."

s: ^Thank you so much, Mrs.Lee! That’s really helpful!!
^That makes a lot of sense, thank you!

Goodbye: ^. I go now, but stop by and say hello soon. See you!"

s: ^Thanks so much for your help, Mrs. Lee. Have the best time dancing. See you!
